sentences: Te peaksite mu vahi alla võtma ja ootama keiserlikke korraldusi.
Sul, keisril, olgu keiserlik ka mõte!
Erihariduse omandas ta Pensa Keiserlikus Kunstikoolis.
context: The word 'peaksite' is the conditional form of the Estonian verb 'pidama' (to hold/keep). In this context, it appears to be part of a larger construction. The dictionary shows an example sentence: 'Te peaksite mu vahi alla võtma ja ootama keiserlikke korraldusi' which translates to 'You should/must take me into custody and wait for imperial orders.' Here 'peaksite' means 'should' or 'must,' indicating obligation in the conditional tense.
